segments.text: Excuse me . Would you tell me where The People's Park is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The People's Park is located on Nanjing Road , near Limbo road , just on the opposite side of the International Hotel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will it take me to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not going in the wrong direction , am I ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you aren't . Just go ahead , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I take a bus to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can take the No . 22 trolley bus to get there .
segments.speaker: S2
